label: ABC3_hR30_155_de_f_de2f-001
title: Low Temperature GdBO$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
(Ren, 1999) found two structures for GdBO$_{3}$: this low-temperature rhombohedral structure, and \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_hP10_194_c_a_h-002}{a high-temperature hexagonal structure}. 
 There is large thermal hysteresis in this system, with the LT $\rightarrow$ HT transition taking place at 1109K and the HT $\rightarrow$ LT transition at 819K. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
